text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Maruyama was born in Setagaya, Tokyo on June 16, 1989. After graduating from Meiji University, he joined J1 League club FC Tokyo in 2012. However there were few opportunities to play. In 2014, he moved to J2 League club Shonan Bellmare on loan. He played many matches as center back. In 2015, he returned to Tokyo. He played many matches from summer 2015. In July 2019, he moved to Nagoya Grampus. On October 11, 2016, Maruyama debuted for the Japan national team against Australia. He played 2 games for Japan in 2016. ==Club statistics== Updated to 19 July 2022.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 104 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2017 J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 (NSK MOOK)", 8 February 2017, Japan, (p. 263 out of 289) Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Continental Continental Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.
